title: Did US Senate Fail to Acquit Trump Because There Wasn’t a ‘Real’ Trial?
subtitle: Trump's impeachment trial in the U.S. Senate was a source of controversy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Trump wasn't really acquitted of articles of impeachment brought by the U.S. House because he didn't have a "real" trial with new witnesses and documents in the U.S. Senate.
